DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine efficacy and safety of 3% minoxidil lotion for chest hair enhancement.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of 3% Minoxidil Lotion for Chest Hair Enhancement
DOC.criteria: healthy male serious underlying diseases history of chest/ hair treatment before 6 months history of surgery or trauma on chest area. history of minoxidil allergy
